tool.name: Constrained Conf Gen
tool.command: ln -s $refmol ./refmol.${refmol.ext} && python -m pipelines.rdkit.constrained_conf_gen -i '$infile' -if sdf -r './refmol.${refmol.ext}' #if $core_smi -c '$core_smi' #end if -o outp -of sdf &>> $logfile && gzip -d outp.sdf.gz

param.name: refmolidx
param.label: Reference Mol Index
param.help: Reference molecule index in file if not the first

param.name: number
param.label: Number of conformers
param.help: Number of conformers to generate, if None then input structures are assumed to already be 3D')

param.name: core_smi
param.label: Core substructure
param.help: If not specified - guessed using MCS
